Reviews.Title: “Fun weekend trip”
Reviews.Author: milnnjc
Reviews.Content: reading recent reviews nervous arriving resort rented 2 bedroom condo 2 nights labour day weekend check girl friendly helpful efficient condo extremely clean spacious family 5 master king bed queen bed kitchen plenty cutlery utensils etc excellent resort definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “you have been warned”
Reviews.Author: Joan B
Reviews.Content: reserved week sept 2011 arrived air conditioning frequently blacked remote control broken taped hold carpet filthy underwear former guest closet dirty silver wear edge bedone hard brown wash rag bathroom amd hard faded spotted former guests deck sheets bed totaly worn picture stay manager money woud months called hadnt received correct address warned kansas

Reviews.Title: “Fall Break”
Reviews.Author: Grandma1913
Reviews.Content: son daughterinlaw grandson stayed pointe royal resort five nights condo clean modern bedrooms baths beds completely furnished washer dryer plus comforts home gated condo indoor pool golf courses
